text: I had a similar portfolio when I fired mine. I had some small caps $IJR and a heavier exposure to international, but the same general gist. As long as you don’t sell an underperforming asset when it’s out of favor, you’ll be good to go.
author: Bluesummers Financial

text:
If you are a buy and hold investor, consider these funds instead of the indices: 

$VOO > $SPY
$QQQM > $QQQ
$IJR > $IWM 

All of these track the same stocks but have cheaper expense ratios.

Thank me later.
